attributes.action: remove the probability of abuse happening to a child as an excuse in family courts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we would like to dually request that the prime minister request to parliment that the excuse of probability of an event happening as an excuse to remove a child from his or her parents, 
if there is the probability of abuse happening then there has also got to be a fight that there is a chance it may not happen aswell which parents are not allowed to use as an excuse at present time,.
